The Fish Interfaith Center


















Campus Life



Fish Interfaith Center








Follow













Â»
    Let us walk with you on your journey of exploration



"How do I navigate life?"
"Where do I find purpose and meaning?"
"What do I believe?"
These are just some of the crucial questions you'll encounter on your journey of exploration. We at Fish are here to help guide and encourage you as you seek within to find the answers. Whether it is through a specific religious tradition, mindfulness, meditation, or simply spiritual exploration, we provide a safe, open, and inclusive space for you to seek purpose, value, and truth.
Our chaplains of various faith traditions and academic expertise are the living representatives of Chapman's spiritual pillar. They not only conduct religious and spiritual services and provide educational programming, but also care for all members of the Chapman community. Though they accomplish this through a diverse array of beliefs, teachings, and values, all of our chaplains are united in their empathetic presence, their eagerness to listen, and their unconditional compassion.
Get Social with us!Facebook @FishInterfaithCenterInstagram @FishInterfaithTwitter @CU_Interfaith

 
Office Hours:Monday-Friday, 8am-9pm
Spring Break Hours:Monday-Friday, 8am-5pm
